name: Discord-UI Clone

name: DeBlog

Description: A full stack MERN app to find restaurants and also give them reviews

name: Boxing Rania
Description: A game where a random boxer gets knocked when he loses all his points.

name: Meta Music
Description: Metamusic is a decentralized music platform where artists can showcase their work as NFT , and can claim rewards for the same.
